2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
RETURN OF THE DRAGONS!

The fateful day is finally here: July 7, X791! A lunar eclipse presages an invasion by ten thousand dragons. Humanity's only hope is the Eclipse Cannon, but what waits behind the door: hope or despair? Will history repeat itself, and Earthland be taken over by dragons once again? The time has come for the dragon slayers to prove their magic lives up to its name!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Volume 39

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: "Leadership."

The epic Dawn of X crossover reaches its penultimate chapter, and things are heating up in both Past and Future! 'A Hint of Things to Come' Part Three: Mega Man, Pharaoh Man and Bright Man-trapped and at the mercy of a long lost Wily Weapon! Can Dr. Light find a way to stop it, or is this the end of Mega Man's story? And what will robot-hating Xander do in a future filled with reploids? Featuring all-new cover art from the legendary Patrick 'Spaz' Spaziante and a 32-Bit-style cut scene variant from mega-artist Ryan Jampole!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: The Archer is back and he's turned Gotham upside down. This time he's robbing the police and giving to the crooks.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Chapter Thirty-Nine

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Bonnie’s figured out how to permanently end the ringleader’s carnival, but will it cost Jeremy part of his humanity?
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Circus of Souls Part 3 of 3

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: 2014 Talent Hunt winning team! The story of the very first Darkness bearer told by Jackie Esacado.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The First Darkness

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The ranks of Hob’s gang are growing, and two other mutants want in... Bebop & Rocksteady!! Will they imperil the Turtles’ wary alliance with Hob? And just what the heck are Don and Harold busy building? Read on to find out!

List of covers and their creators:

BCover BKevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c)2
RIRetailer IncentiveUlises Farinas3
As the slugfest between Batman and Rewire continues, Commissioner Barbara Gordon and Bruce Wayne work together to save Dick Grayson from certain death!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Alternating Currents, Part 3 of 4: Selfless

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: IN 5 MONTHS...TIME RUNS OUT!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: You Can't Win, Part 1

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: A sneaky cartoonist (i.e., a normal cartoonist) turns SpongeBob and Patrick into the stars of a new hit comic strip–"PlungeBob and Splatrick"– and the briny buddies can't handle the fame! Then, in "Ship Wrecked," Mrs. Puff's vacation cruise is severely compromised by a certain stowaway fry cook. Plus: Kaz (Underworld) and Gary Leib (Idiotland) tell the tale of the customer who hates SpongeBob; Maris Wicks (Primates) reveals scientific secrets of the puffer fish; and Scott Roberts (Patty Cake) draws a very Pogo-esque SpongeBob pin-up!

It's the penultimate chapter of the “The Q Gambit”! Captains Kirk and Sisko must work together to fight back against the forces of the Dominion! Meanwhile, Spock attempts to free the Enterprise and her crew from the clutches of the nefarious Dukat! And just what is Q planning for everyone involved? The fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance in this all-new story produced in association with STAR TREK writer/producer Roberto Orci!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverTony Shasteen1
SubSubscription Cover (Photo)Unlisted2
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Q Gambit Part 5

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
AXIS Aftermath!

The smoke has cleared, and the AXIS Event is Over! The Inversion has been reversed and all is (almost) right with the world!

Now that Apocalypse has reverted back to Evan, it's time to pick-up the pieces and go home. And by pieces, we mean Deadpool's disembodied head!

Can they find Wade's body before it grows a new head? Can they make it out of Manhattan alive? Will Shiklah ever forgive her husband for becoming Zen-Pool? And what about the Faux-Men?

Stop asking questions and READ the BOOK!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: A Friend Indeed...

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Someone has pieced together the mystery behind the plot to crush Gotham City…but it’s not Batman! The Riddler knows all – and he’ll never tell!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Right Question

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
In this issue...

Shhh! Wanna discover top secret tricks, tips and secrets to help you master Club Penguin like a pro? Then get your flippers on this fun-packed issue and prepare to max out your coins and amaze your penguins pals! What's more, every reader gets an awesome free gift and 1500 coins!

Dr. Polaris is finally aboard the Justice League satellite, and he’ll be sure the Justice League faces the ghosts of every civilian they might’ve saved during the war, if only they didn’t consider themselves too godly to care. Also – up in the sky! It’s definitely not Superman. And it isn’t good!

The terror from Smallville has spread across the globe, and now Superman must make a sacrifice to save it! Don’t miss the final chapter of “Horrorville”!

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Under the Skin

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Can Batman put an end to Anarky once and for all? Or will the citizens of Gotham City even let him try?

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Anarky, Part 3

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Green Arrow versus Seattle! The odds don’t look too good for Ollie in this issue!
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Kingdom, Chapter Five

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Hal Jordan returns to Oa knowing he has to face the consequences for defying the Templar Guardians during “Godhead.” But whatever the Guardians have planned for him pales before the true threat the Corps will soon face. Hal’s about to learn that sometimes fighting for the greater good comes at an even greater personal cost.

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Ripple Effect

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: “The Machine Queen” part 5! The Swamp is dead. The machines rule the planet. Alec Holland’s greatest foes are arrayed against him, and the few allies he has left have gone into hiding. It is the end...unless the Swamp Thing can return to the beginning, to fix his greatest mistake.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Failure Modes

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
As John Stewart and his team try to root out the criminal network that has overtaken the homeworld of Lantern Feska, they discover the planet is imperiled by a far darker, deadlier force. An enemy with an ancient hatred of the Corps. An enemy that seeks to cast all the universe into shadow.

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Demons

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
For months, Batgirl’s been hounded by an unseen threat claiming to be the “real” Batgirl…and the truth of her enemy’s identity will shock her to her very core

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Batgirl vs. Burnside

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Has Damian Wayne become something more than human? And how do you control a reckless child who now has super powers?

Notes:

  • Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.

  • The regular cover is a homage of the cover of Action Comics #1.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Superpower - Boy Wonder

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The mystery of Red Alice! Is Batwoman’s sister truly reformed?

Note: Though this issue is another installment in the "How In The Hell Did We Get Here?" storyline, and a direct continuation from the previous issue, the storyline's title is not mentioned within the issue.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Alice, Sweet Alice

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: With the Templar Guardians still on Oa, Kyle faces the very real prospect that his life may soon come to an end. The love of Carol Ferris alone can’t save him, and the foundation of the cosmos hangs in the balance.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: It All Ends Here, Part 2 of 3

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
“The Amazo Virus” concludes with haunting consequences!

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on the variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Amazo Virus, Chapter Four: the Infected

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: As Arsenal and Red Hood confront their demons, Starfire is out for blood when she hunts down the person responsible for her recent addiction. But will her act of vengeance help her – or destroy her?
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Reunion

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
All-out war breaks out on Crucible over the fate of Superboy, as Kara faces new and old enemies.

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Crucible, Part 4

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Wonder Woman returns to Paradise Island, and she’s in for a surprise: The Amazons have chosen a new queen to lead them! The identity of this new queen will send shock waves through the entire DC Universe! Guest-starring the Justice League and featuring the introduction of Diana’s craziest new cast member in, well, ever!

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only along with Aleka

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: War-Torn Chapter 4

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Aquaman’s mother is alive – and she wants him dead! Welcome to the family reunion from hell!

Maelstrom part 5 of 6

Arthur and Mera are attacked by Atlanna and her soldiers, including Gontu. After Arthur tries to plead with Atlanna, to believe he is her son, she is able to knock Arthur and Mera out.

She then takes them to Karaku, the Volcano God, as a sacrifice, but Arthur wakes in time. He grabs Mera and Lenu and makes an escape. They don't get far when they are attacked by Atlanna's monsters.

During the battle the Maelstorm is activated and an army of Atlantean troops emerge. The battle seems to turn in Arthur favors when Karaku erupts from the volcano, to destroy everone.

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Maelstrom V: Pacifica

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
“Endgame” part 5. The Joker is back! The penultimate issue of the Clown Prince of Crime’s horrifying return! Plus, in the backup story, the inmates and Mahreen finally learn the truth about The Joker!

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Endgame, Part Five; The Last Smile

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Will Selina save Gotham City? Or will she burn it to the ground?

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Better Than He Does Himself

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Barry Allen is trapped in the Speed Force while an impostor wreaks havoc at home! Can The Fastest Man Alive make it back in time to put things right?

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Power Loss

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The JLD is reunited! But being lost in the timestream could not prepare them to confront the living embodiment of time itself. And she’s hungry...

NOTE: Harley Quinn appears on variant cover only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Amber of the Moment, Part Five: Pralaya

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: The rage left behind on Earth following the Atrocitus War is spreading and in danger of erupting at any moment! Guy is determined to purge the world in order to save it, but can a man looking to die stop a primal force on a heavily populated planet?
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Hush Li'l Baby

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
This emotional story reveals a rarely seen side of The Man of Steel as an ordinary person, as the super-star team of Geoff Johns, John Romita, Jr. and Klaus Janson continue their epic run on the series!

NOTE: Harley Quinn and Atrocitus appear on variant covers only.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: 24 Hours

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Chapter 5 of the BLACK VORTEX!

Storm formulates a plan as the heroes fail to penetrate Mr. Knife’s Flying Fortress. Meanwhile, Beast and Kitty travel to Spartax to decipher the secrets of the Vortex book. And to make matters worse, Kitty and Peter’s relationship takes a downward turn!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
OPENING SALVO! The Autobots and Decepticons’ uneasy peace is threatened by the flames of war! STARSCREAM—ruler of CYBERTRON—makes contact with WINDBLADE’S homeworld—and the only defense against a new CYBERTRONIAN EMPIRE are COMBINERS—multiple CYBERTRONIANS forming together into huge, dangerous forms!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: The Monster of Gore Bay concludes. Confronted by the real sea monster, the Spence Gang sends the beast into a rampaging fury. If it destroys its own undersea cavern, it will bury not just the gangsters, but Batman and Robin too.

RETURN OF THE D.J.D.! A punishment squad created by MEGATRON to hunt down dissidents, turncoats and cowards—no one believes more passionately in the DECEPTICON cause than the D.J.D. So what happens when they discover their founder has joined the Autobots? (Clue: it’s not pretty.)

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
The entire world of Ooo is not able to cook but Jake comes through and saves the day with his sandwiches. It’s not over yet, though, as the witch is gonna summon her ultimate monster baddie.

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Diana teaches a young thug a lesson about how having a pet forces you to train "Both Ends of the Leash."
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Both Ends of the Leash Part 1 of 1

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
All of humanity has prayed for it secretly and quietly as the gods destroyed the world around them. "Please...just let them all die." And after years of suffering it seems the prayers were answered...all the gods are gone. Or are they just somewhere else? It all changes here, as the most innovative mythology mashup ever published continues is unprecedented run and Mike Costa tells the latest shocking chapter in the world of divine destruction.

Available with a Regular Cover by Jacen Burrows, End of Days, Iconic, & Enchanting Covers by Jose Luis, Carnage Wraparound Cover by German Nobile, and a special Gilded Retailer Incentive cover also by Luis.

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: [Untitled]; The Beast On His Belly

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
ALL-NEW ARC! ALL-NEW JUMPING-ON POINT! “EXODUS” BEGINS NOW!

Aric of Dacia is X-O Manowar, hero to humanity, leader of the remaining Visigoths, and a husband about to start a new family. He is also the bearer of Shanhara, and tantamount to a God in the eyes of the alien race known as the Vine. Now, in the aftermath of DEAD HAND, the Vine need a new home and have chosen Earth – tearing Aric between two races that worship him, but each despise one another. New York Times best-selling writer Robert Venditti (BOOK OF DEATH) and red-hot artist Rafa Sandoval (Ultimate Hawkeye) unite here to begin a bold and tragic new era in the life of X-O Manowar!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: The Marvel Chess Collection is a bi-weekly series featuring some of the greatest Marvel characters. The second set in the Marvel Chess Collection features the X-Men. Continue your collection with Cyclops (White King) (#38), Magneto (Black King) (#39), Rogue (White Bishop) (#40), and Daken (Black Pawn) (#41).
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Magneto [Black King]

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: When a strange force flings the TARDIS into our universe, the Doctor encounters a 12-year-old girl who happens to be a huge fan of the Doctor Who television show. The Doctor must then grapple with being a fictional character, along with monsters lurking in the girl’s school, on the way to coming face-to-face with the actor who portrays him, Matt Smith. Written by Doctor Who TV writer Paul Cornell and artist Jimmy Broxton to celebrate the 50th anniversary of Doctor Who.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: The Girl Who Loved Doctor Who

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Before Calie's first encounter with the looking glass, her mother's mind was rocked by her own adventures in Wonderland. Meet Alice Liddle - mother, housewife, and just a little mad. As Alice's mind slips further and further from reality, a very real and very obsessed man turns his unwanted affections toward her. When Alice confronts her stalker, she sets in motion a series of events that Calie will one day have to face.

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Upon receiving an important clue from the Magic Mirror, Bigby races to Central Park to find the Crooked Man.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Chapter Thirty-Nine

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description:
Popeye, the beloved swab, is back in this comic that could be hailed as “Bud Sagendorf’s Comics and Stories”! The long-time assistant to Popeye’s creator E.C. Segar took all the great chops from his boss and added more spinach and surrealism for a heady and hilarious mix! This issue boasts Popeye, Wimpy and in a 25-page pot-boiler, “The Mountain That Talked Back!” and more!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Chapter 416 - 426.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Hito no Honshitsu

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Translates Superman #36 & Supergirl #36.
Translates Green Lantern Corps #35, Green Lantern: New Guardians #35 & Red Lanterns #35.
While Batman and Gordon investigate last issue's stunning murder, the Arkham Knight's forces assemble for an epic showdown on Halloween.
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Epilogue

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Translates Justice League #37 & New Suicide Squad #3.
Translates Detective Comics #37-38.

There are some serious parenting problems in this issue of Batman! In Batman & Robin, Batman has to get used to the reborn Damian, now with superpowers. Meanwhile, in Batman Eternal Batgirl, Catwoman, Spoiler and Julia all have problems with their own fathers. Last but not least, in the second part of ‘Friends,’ we learn the consequences of being friends with the Joker!

2014-06-01|2015-12-30.deck: Una terribile epidemia colpisce l'umanità, costringendola a percorrere a ritroso la scala evolutiva...
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.description: Futuro prossimo. L’umanità è martoriata dalla più incredibile delle epidemie, la cosiddetta “Renitenza del Fattore HSS”. Gli infetti paiono regredire, come se arretrassero nella scala evolutiva verso forme di vita sempre più primitive. Sospesa sulla soglia di un mistero insondabile, la civiltà si disgrega e uomini senza scrupoli governano il caos con la violenza… Su tutto e su tutti incombe però un destino che nessuno può prevedere…
2014-06-01|2015-12-30.name: Neogenesi
